casebody.data:
National Iron Bank v. United States Fidelity and Guaranty Company

Cotter, C. J., Loiselle, Bogdanski, Peters and Healey, Js.

Argued November 7 decision released December 18, 1979 Donald McPartland, with whom was Wilder G. Gleason, for the appellant (defendant). Carlo Forsani, with whom, on the brief, was Joseph F. Keefe, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

It appearing that the amount in controversy in the present appeal is less than seven thousand five hundred dollars and that pursuant to § 51-197d (1) of the General Statutes the appeal is properly within the jurisdiction of the appellate session under Practice Book, 1978, §3076, it is ordered that the appeal be transferred to the appellate session for resolution.

The appeal is transferred.
